text: "Liberals" (rightly) claiming that Dadri event is like India degenerating into Pakistan. But then they also think that Pak is just all right
yes, outwardly that's how it appears. But he didn't say anything so direct on Dadri incident, so it could well be calculated.
Isn't that reporter the same guy who took selfie, all smiling, outside Akhlaq's house in Dadri? https://twitter.com/OpIndia_com/status/787206670833377280 …

This charlatan had linked Dadri to Kashmir (search 'Guha' here http://www.opindia.com/2017/03/pakistan-has-started-a-war-and-it-is-winning-it-but-you-can-fight-back/ …) wait for a few days and he'd link Amarnath to Junaidhttps://twitter.com/Ram_Guha/status/884626849296416768 …
